reporter-output.line: Setting Environment to: PROD
Environment: PROD
Open url 'http://qa5dev.publisher.nbcuni.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Enter 'Pub Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Post' to appear in the list.
Verify content menu item 'Content' is present in the site taxonomy.
Verify content menu item 'My Workbench' is present in the site taxonomy.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Enter '0f90029b2109449' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 0f90029b2109449 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Verify the 'View' is present in the work bench.
Verify the 'Edit Draft' is present in the work bench.
Verify the 'Revisions' is present in the work bench.
Verify the 'Schedule' is present in the work bench.
Click the 'Revision' link.
Click the 'Edit Draft' in the work bench.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify the text 'Revision state' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the text 'Public' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the text 'Moderate' is present in the work bench info block.
Click the 'Revisions' in the work bench.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
verifyObjectContainsText: Object //div[@class='content']//tbody contains the text 0f90029b2109449
verifyObjectContainsText: Object //div[@class='content']//tbody contains the text Moderate to Publish
verifyObjectContainsText: Object //div[@class='content']//tbody contains the text 02/25/2014 - 05:00 PM
verifyObjectContainsText: Object //div[@class='content']//tbody contains the text Moderate to Published
verifyObjectContainsText: Object //div[@class='content']//tbody contains the text Completed
Click the 'Revision' link.
